overview: The sexy dark truth about a cursed Hollywood cam-house is uncovered when a half-naked girl is found dead in the pool. Scared, beautiful cam girls become obsessed with hardcore sex, but when demonic spirits & paranormal activity invade the mansion, even the LAPD is baffled at finding the killer in a sexy who-dunnit-mystery.
tagline: Some problems even the police can't solve.
title: The Cursed XXX
